name: SetPlayerMapIcon
notes:
If you use an invalid marker type, it will create ID 1 (White Square).
 If you use an icon ID that is already in use, it will replace the current map icon using that ID.
warnings:
You can only have 100 map icons!
 Marker type 1 (), 2 (), 4 (), and 56 () will cause your game to crash if you have map legends enabled while viewing the map.
description: Place an icon/marker on a player's map. Can be used to mark locations such as banks and hospitals to players.
params_title: (playerid, iconid, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z, markertype, color, style)

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to set the map icon for.

params_body.name: iconid
params_body.description: The player's icon ID, ranging from 0 to 99. This means there is a maximum of 100 map icons. ID can be used in RemovePlayerMapIcon.

params_body.name: Float:x
params_body.description: The X coordinate to place the map icon at.

params_body.name: Float:y
params_body.description: The Y coordinate to place the map icon at.

params_body.name: Float:z
params_body.description: The Z coordinate to place the map icon at.

params_body.name: color
params_body.description: The color of the icon, as an integer or hex in RGBA color format. This should only be used with the square icon (ID: 0).

return_values: 0: The function failed to execute. Player is not connected.
related_fn:
RemovePlayerMapIcon: Remove a map icon for a player.
 SetPlayerMarkerForPlayer: Set a player's marker.
